Recommendation.title: Diagnose and Resolve Internal Server Error

steps.action: Check error logs for specific issues
steps.description: Reviewing error logs helps identify the root cause, such as memory issues or database problems.

steps.action: Enable debug mode for detailed error messages
steps.description: Enabling debug mode provides more detailed information about where the error occurs.

steps.action: Test without .htaccess or with commented directives
steps.description: Incorrect directives in .htaccess can cause server errors; testing without it can isolate the issue.
Incorrect permissions can prevent server access, leading to errors.
Database issues can cause internal errors; ensuring proper configuration and status is crucial.

steps.action: Adjust PHP memory limit if necessary
steps.description: Increasing the memory limit can resolve errors caused by insufficient memory.
